original_title: Cloche petite aux merveilles du pays
overview: Cloche is an homeless and clumsy young woman. She exhausts her companions with her blunders. They end up excluding her from their camp. Unable to fend for herself, starving, freezing, and afraid, Cloche goes downtown. A little odyssey begins that will change her life.
title: Cloche petite aux merveilles du pays
